extendedInfo.description: With the ESPN Fantasy Football app, you can manage multiple teams and leagues, follow your matchups in real-time, add/drop/trade players, and make last-second lineup changes from wherever you are. Spend your Sundays constantly connected to all of your leagues and teams and you won't miss the chance to grab that backup RB turned fantasy stud. The ESPN Fantasy Football App provides the added advantage you need to dominate your fantasy league.Features include:â¢Team Management: Start/bench players, add, drop, and claim players off waivers, propose, accept or reject trades with other managersâ¢FantasyCast Live Scoring and Stats: Real-time scoring and detailed information for all your matchups.â¢Personalized Push Notifications for injuries, substitutions, and scoring updates.â¢Fantasy News, Videos and Tweets from ESPNâs fantasy analysts.â¢View and post messages to your leagueâs message boardDownload now because there's no better time to check on your fantasy teams, than anytime you please.NOTE: You must have an ESPN Fantasy Football team to use this app. This app will only manage your 2013 teams; past and future teams are not supported.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Easy access, very simple to use. Easy to link up for player updates. BW, Samsung galaxy 3
reviews.author: Ben Watkins

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I love the flow, its actually  very user friendly.
reviews.author: Timothy Lom

reviews.title: Give five stars
reviews.comment: Very well done. Easy to manage your team quickly and effectively.
reviews.author: Zach Woodwyk

reviews.comment: Way better than Yahoo fantasy app, more in depth, faster and user friendly! Def recommend!
reviews.author: Alex Martin

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Pretty good and easy to manage, however a different layout system would be nice.
reviews.author: Cole Carter

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app but it would be nice if I could do more with league settings. If it were possible draft lobbies would be awesome
reviews.author: Justin Castro

reviews.title: Best app!!
reviews.comment: Best fantasy app!! Easy to use, updates are real time, and great design all around!!
reviews.author: cody snyder

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: User friendly, real time stats. A great welcome back to football season!
reviews.author: Autumn Hope

reviews.title: Could Be Better
reviews.comment: Lots of great info and stats here. Please fix bug in Message Board. When I try to send a message it wants to start every word with an upper case letter. Also, please make it possible to change profile info like team name or photo.
reviews.author: Javier Camacho

reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
reviews.comment: Once signed in, all I see is \"Signed in as my_username\". You\'d think a multinational company worth billions could release an app that works occasionally.  Nexus 7, rooted.
reviews.author: Sam Koepnick

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Love being able to keep track of my Fantasy Team, great app.
reviews.author: Domenique Sandoval

reviews.title: I can\'t sign in to my account and the developers don\'t accept emails.
reviews.comment: Here\'s what I tried to send in the email:  I\'m unable to sign in to my fantasy football account. When I try to sign in, it says \" You are signed in as ____\" Then the only choice is sign out. If I push the back button, I am taken back to the first screen where I am told I must sign in.  Galaxy S3, rooted.
reviews.author: Ernie Magana

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: All it does it says \"signed in as ...\". I am unable to access existing teams or my leagues. The season has already started, please fix!!!
reviews.author: Leslie Herrera

reviews.title: It is functional but could be better....
reviews.comment: Yahoo\'s can draft... Step your game up. Add the Gridiron Challenge and other fantasy games that you have and I\'ll give you 5 Stars.
reviews.author: Brandon G.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Enjoyed the quick access to my league\'s. Nice layout, easy to navigate.
reviews.author: Kevin O\'Brien

reviews.title: Good app be better in nicer res and stuff
reviews.comment: Pretty good
reviews.author: Dustin Kerns

reviews.title: Runs well
reviews.comment: Now they just need to make it look good like the ESPN app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great but.....
reviews.comment: Works great most of the time but this app really needs a widget for game day scoring and news. If it had that this would be a 5 start rating no questions asked.
reviews.author: Brandon McGraw

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Loads fast, shows realtime scoreboard and has pretty decent team management UI.  Some elements such as buttons could be cleaner and better but all in all it\'s really decent.
reviews.author: George McMonigle

reviews.title: Needs major facelift.
reviews.comment: Great if you are in a bind and need very minimal access to your team or want to watch your weekend points, but doesn\'t allow enough for people in a mobile world like we live in today. Needs improvements like the IOS versions have gotten. Maybe they are coming up for Android too?  Running stock OS on LTE Galaxy Nexus
reviews.author: Dan Gates
